The location of CitizenM Kuala Lumpur is great and is probably the main reason for its price point. Great access to Bukit Bintang. Even locations such as the Petronas Towers are within walking distance on a fully pedestrian accessible route if you're up for the few kilometre journey.

Comfort was beyond expectation. Although the room is small, the bed and other amenities were of high standard. The iPad system to control the lights and connect other devices to the TV were simple to use. The fact that we could connect our own Netflix and YouTube accounts to the TV securely made our nights much more enjoyable. Double layered curtains made a sleep-in very possible, or gave us confidence in privacy from the neighbouring buildings and main road.

The location felt safe. We walked back from the centre of Bukit Bintang on many late nights and did not notice anything strange or of concern. The front area of the hotel is generally quiet at night, yet there is security in the lobby and the main entrance requires a keycard during late hours.

The staff were very helpful and did much more than expected, including ordering Grab Taxis for us and recommending local tourist attractions.
